headline: McDonald’s Stock Faces New Downgrade. ‘Pricing Power Has Eroded.’
summary: Morgan Stanley downgraded McDonald’s stock to Equal-Weight from Overweight, and trimmed its price target to $324 from $329.

headline: MS downgrades McDonald’s on limited upside and structural pressures on fast food
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley downgraded McDonald’s (NYSE:MCD) Corp to Equal-weight from Overweight, saying the fast-food giant’s stock already reflects much of its near-term improvement, while longer-term challenges remain.

headline: Stocks climb, dollar dips with US-China trade talks eyed
summary: Global stocks climbed onMonday while the dollar retreated as talks began in Londonbetween the United States and China, aimed at cooling a tradedispute between the world's two largest economies. ...

headline: DNUT Q1 Earnings Call: Management Focuses on Profitability Amid Slower Sales and McDonald's Pause
summary: Doughnut chain Krispy Kreme (NASDAQ:DNUT) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales falling 15.3% year on year to $375.2 million. Its non-GAAP loss of $0.05 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Arcos Dorados appoints new CEO
summary: Luis Raganato, currently chief operating officer, will succeed Marcelo Rabach on 1 July 2025.
